name: com.sidefx.houdiniengine
description: Houdini Engine for Unity is a Unity plug-in that allows deep integration of Houdini technology into Unity through the use of Houdini Engine. This package is a minimal modification of the initial SideFX non-package Plugin, intended to stay as close to SideFX plugin as possible. For extending UnityEngine implementation inside of Klang projects, please use separate packages.
